robots.name: CYLON
robots.quote: I look heaps like a human

robots.name: R2D2
robots.quote: I secretly have a tiny person inside me

robots.name: ROOMBA
robots.quote: According to John Siracusa I am technically a robot

robots.name: ROB
robots.quote: I was originally created along with the Great Fox under the orders of James McCloud

robots.name: WALL-E
robots.quote: Seriously? You made Cars 2 and I don't get a sequel?

robots.name: HUMAN MALE
robots.quote: I think I'm in the wrong JSON file.
